verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [V: called] [ARG1: NASCAR] [ARG2: a sport for " patriotic Americans] , " [ARGM-ADV: noting that fans of the race stand for the national anthem] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] on Monday called NASCAR a sport for " patriotic Americans , " [V: noting] [ARG1: that fans of the race stand for the national anthem] .
